analysis.rewritten_original_prompt:
The Vista 2K Doorbell brings total peace of mind to your front door. With a stunning 170° view, you’ll see everything from head to toe—and the packages left at your feet.
• 2K Clarity: See every detail in vivid high definition, day or night. • Intelligent Alerts: It knows the difference between a person and a shadow. • Wire-Free Freedom: A powerful rechargeable battery means no drilling or wiring required. • Total Integration: Your home works together, sounding alerts on your speakers the moment someone arrives.
Simple to set up. Impossible to live without. Welcome to a safer home.
